程序包 com.shapeville.model

Enum Class Shape3D

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Shape3D>
com.shapeville.model.Shape3D
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable, Comparable<Shape3D>, Constable
public enum Shape3D extends Enum<Shape3D>
Enumeration of 3D geometric shapes supported in the Shapeville application. Each shape has both English and Chinese names for internationalization support. This enum is used for shape selection, display, and volume/surface area calculations.
从以下版本开始:
2024-05-01
版本:
1.0
作者:
Ye Jin, Jian Wang, Zijie Long, Tianyun Zhang, Xianzhi Dong

    Cuboid shape with English and Chinese names

    Cylinder shape with English and Chinese names
    SPHERE
    Sphere shape with English and Chinese names
    SQUARE_BASED_PYRAMID
    Square-based pyramid shape with English and Chinese names
    TETRAHEDRON
    Tetrahedron shape with English and Chinese names
    TRIANGULAR_PRISM
    Triangular prism shape with English and Chinese names
